dict.string: You can download and install this software when Software Update finishes its current installation.
The selected printer software is available from Apple, but you are not connected to the Internet.
Software Update can’t check for updates because of a network problem.
Software Update can’t connect to the Software Update Server.
("printing software" IN tags OR "printer update" IN tags) AND "MANUFACTURER:Hewlett-Packard;MODEL:HP Color LaserJet CP4520 Series" IN tags
Would you like to download and install software for “HP Color LaserJet CP4520 Series [107A5A]”?
